revision.text: Le modèle de régression logistique multinomial est un modèle qui tente d'expliquer la distribution de données associée à la variable polychotomique (variable dépendante) en fonction desvaleurs de la variable indépendante, en utilisant unefonction probit. multinomial logistic regression model is a model which attempts to explain data distribution associated with *polychotomous* response/dependent variable in terms of values assumed by the independent variable uses a function of predictor/independent variable(s): the function used in this instance of regression modeling is probit function. Alejandra Gonzalez-Beltran Jean-Marc Meunier Orlaith Burke Philippe Rocca-Serra STATO, adapted from wikipedia (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multinomial_probit) polled in June 2013
